channel.title: SpringCloud on 亿观的博客
channel.description: Recent content in SpringCloud on 亿观的博客

item.title: 2、springcloud踩坑或经验记录（SpringCloud）
item.description: 引入OpenFeign启动项目报错 Error creating bean with name ‘com.yiguan.service.users.TestService’: FactoryBean threw exception on object creation; nested exception is java.lang.IllegalStateException: Method has too many Body parameters: public abstract java.lang.String com.yiguan.service.users.TestService.getConfig(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) 原来是在@FeignClient()接口类中，使用@R
